reqs: This course is restricted to students in one of these faculties: GRAD - MEL CEEN Program. Registration requests from graduate students outside of MEL CEEN program will be reviewed on a case-by-case basis depending on seat availability. Please contact MEL CEEN Administrator at ceen@cerc.ubc.ca for details.
description: Analysis of energy systems from resource extraction to energy services. Storage and transport components of energy systems. System optimization including smart grid, transmission, and distribution design for electrical and thermal systems. Distributed generation systems.
